tool.name: neopiscope
tool.command:
neoepiscope call
#if str($name1.hapCUT2_OUTPUT=="Yes" ): -c "${merged_hapCUT2_OUTPUT}" #end if
#if str($build=="hg19"): -b hg19 #else if str($build=="GRCh38"): -b GRCh38 #end if
#if str($name2.affinity=="No"): --no-affinity #else if str($name2.affinity=="Yes"): -p "${affinity_predictor_name}" "${affinity_predictor_version}" "${affinity_predictor_score}" -a "${alleles}" #end if
#if str($kmer)!="default": -k "${kmer}" #end if
-o $output

param.name: hapCUT2_OUTPUT
param.label: Do you have a hapCUT2 output from your vcf file processing?

param.name: merged_hapCUT2_OUTPUT
param.label: Input hapCUT2 output from your vcf file

param.name: build
param.label: Please select your preferred genome build from the drop down list.

param.name: alleles
param.label: Binding affininity predictors require a list of alleles. Please upload your allele file in csv format

param.name: kmer
param.label: Please select your preferred k-mer size from the drop down list.
